messages.criterion-invalid-error: Criterion must contain at least {{min}} characters

messages.create-account: If you subscribed to the web services package, please create your account in the app to be able to sign in here.
messages.delete-account: Enter your pseudo for confirmation. The subscription will be immediately canceled, and all the data will be immediately deleted.
messages.password-constraints: The password must contain at least 8 characters, including 1 uppercase character, 1 digit and 1 special character.
messages.credentials-mismatch-error: Email and password do not match.
messages.password-short-error: Password must contain at least 8 characters
messages.recovery-sent: A recovery link was sent to {{emailAddress}}.
messages.internal-error: An error occurred on the server.
messages.password-invalid-error: Password does not satisfy the aforementioned criteria.
messages.pseudo-conflict-error: Pseudo seems to be used already.
messages.pseudo-invalid-error: Pseudo is invalid. It must contain at least 3 characters.

messages.game-creation-error: The game could not be created.
messages.game-update-error: The game could not be updated. Is it live or completed?
messages.delete-question: Do you want to delete the game {{homeTeam}} - {{guestTeam}}?
messages.delete-all-question: Do you want to delete ALL the games?

messages.schedule-past-error: Game must have a future schedule date
messages.indexed-tooltip: Public games will show for everyone during queries. Private games will not.
messages.same-teams-error: Home and guest teams must be different

rules.name: Rules name
rules.points-per-tie-break: Number of points in tie break
rules.team-timeouts-per-set: Number of team timeouts per set
rules.team-substitutions-per-set: Number of team substitutions per set
rules.consecutive-serves-per-player: Limit of consecutive serves per player
rules.court-switch-frequency: Court switch frequency in normal set
rules.court-switch-frequency-tie-break: Court switch frequency in tie break
rules.substitutions-limitation-fivb:
A player of the starting line-up may leave the game, but only once in a set, and re-enter, but only once in a set, and only to his/her previous position in the line-up.

A substitute player may enter the game in place of a player of the starting line-up, but only once per set, and he/she can only be substituted by the same starting player.
rules.substitutions-limitation-alt-1:
A player of the starting line-up may leave the game, several times in a set, and re-enter, an unlimited amount of times per set (within the number of allowed team substitutions), and only to his/her previous position in the line-up.

A substitute player may enter the game in place of a player of the starting line-up, an unlimited amount of times per set (within the number of allowed team substitutions), and he/she can only be substituted by the same starting player.
rules.substitutions-limitation-alt-2:
A player of the starting line-up may leave the game, several times in a set, and re-enter, an unlimited amount of times per set (within the number of allowed team substitutions), and only to his/her previous position in the line-up.

A substitute player may enter the game in place of a player of the starting line-up, an unlimited amount of times per set (within the number of allowed team substitutions).

More than one substitute may enter the set in each position.
rules.substitutions-limitation-none: Players can leave and re-enter the game on any position, an unlimited amount of times per set (within the number of allowed team substitutions).

match-termination-options.normal: Finish the match as soon as a team wins
match-termination-options.play-all: Finish the match when all the sets have been played
